title: Sketchbook Folio, "The Betrayal of Christ", 1821–22
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at upper left 35; at lower left: Benvenuto Garofalo Ferrara
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: In nocturnal landscape with crescent moon, Judas gives kiss of betrayal to Christ at center. Military commander and soldiers at right, men struggling at left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "The Betrayal of Christ", 1821–22.
1821–22. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, over traces of black chalk on white heavy wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3575.
